title: Pathogen
description: Enumeration of classes of pathogens, e.g., bacteria, viruses, fungi, protozoa, prions, or multicellular parasites.

pathogen_type.description: The name of the pathogen class.

pathogen_description.description: A human-readable description of the pathogen class.

taxon_id.description: Taxon ID for this pathogen class.

country.description: Name of the country where sample was collected.

run_accession.description: Unique identifier assigned to a specific set of raw sequencing data files from a single sequencing event.

experiment_title.description: Brief, descriptive, human-readable title for a specific sequencing experiment.
